00052 /*******************************************************************************
00053  *****************************     DEFINES     *********************************
00054  ******************************************************************************/
00055 
00058 /* Reset cause "don't care" definitions.
00059    1's mark the bits that must be zero, zeros are "don't cares". */
00060 #if (_RMU_RSTCAUSE_MASK == 0x0000007FUL)
00061 #define RMU_RSTCAUSE_PORST_XMASK         (0x00000000) 
00062 #define RMU_RSTCAUSE_BODUNREGRST_XMASK   (0x00000081) 
00063 #define RMU_RSTCAUSE_BODREGRST_XMASK     (0x00000091) 
00064 #define RMU_RSTCAUSE_EXTRST_XMASK        (0x00000001) 
00065 #define RMU_RSTCAUSE_WDOGRST_XMASK       (0x00000003) 
00066 #define RMU_RSTCAUSE_LOCKUPRST_XMASK     (0x0000EFDF) 
00067 #define RMU_RSTCAUSE_SYSREQRST_XMASK     (0x0000EF9F) 
00068 #define NUM_RSTCAUSES                             (7)
00069 
00070 #elif (_RMU_RSTCAUSE_MASK == 0x000007FFUL)
00071 #define RMU_RSTCAUSE_PORST_XMASK         (0x00000000) 
00072 #define RMU_RSTCAUSE_BODUNREGRST_XMASK   (0x00000081) 
00073 #define RMU_RSTCAUSE_BODREGRST_XMASK     (0x00000091) 
00074 #define RMU_RSTCAUSE_EXTRST_XMASK        (0x00000001) 
00075 #define RMU_RSTCAUSE_WDOGRST_XMASK       (0x00000003) 
00076 #define RMU_RSTCAUSE_LOCKUPRST_XMASK     (0x0000EFDF) 
00077 #define RMU_RSTCAUSE_SYSREQRST_XMASK     (0x0000EF9F) 
00078 #define RMU_RSTCAUSE_EM4RST_XMASK        (0x00000719) 
00079 #define RMU_RSTCAUSE_EM4WURST_XMASK      (0x00000619) 
00080 #define RMU_RSTCAUSE_BODAVDD0_XMASK      (0x0000041F) 
00081 #define RMU_RSTCAUSE_BODAVDD1_XMASK      (0x0000021F) 
00082 #define NUM_RSTCAUSES                            (11)
00083 
00084 #elif (_RMU_RSTCAUSE_MASK == 0x0000FFFFUL)
00085 #define RMU_RSTCAUSE_PORST_XMASK         (0x00000000) 
00086 #define RMU_RSTCAUSE_BODUNREGRST_XMASK   (0x00000081) 
00087 #define RMU_RSTCAUSE_BODREGRST_XMASK     (0x00000091) 
00088 #define RMU_RSTCAUSE_EXTRST_XMASK        (0x00000001) 
00089 #define RMU_RSTCAUSE_WDOGRST_XMASK       (0x00000003) 
00090 #define RMU_RSTCAUSE_LOCKUPRST_XMASK     (0x0000EFDF) 
00091 #define RMU_RSTCAUSE_SYSREQRST_XMASK     (0x0000EF9F) 
00092 #define RMU_RSTCAUSE_EM4RST_XMASK        (0x00000719) 
00093 #define RMU_RSTCAUSE_EM4WURST_XMASK      (0x00000619) 
00094 #define RMU_RSTCAUSE_BODAVDD0_XMASK      (0x0000041F) 
00095 #define RMU_RSTCAUSE_BODAVDD1_XMASK      (0x0000021F) 
00096 #define RMU_RSTCAUSE_BUBODVDDDREG_XMASK  (0x00000001) 
00097 #define RMU_RSTCAUSE_BUBODBUVIN_XMASK    (0x00000001) 
00098 #define RMU_RSTCAUSE_BUBODUNREG_XMASK    (0x00000001) 
00099 #define RMU_RSTCAUSE_BUBODREG_XMASK      (0x00000001) 
00100 #define RMU_RSTCAUSE_BUMODERST_XMASK     (0x00000001) 
00101 #define NUM_RSTCAUSES                            (16)
00102 
00103 #elif ((_RMU_RSTCAUSE_MASK & 0x0FFFFFFF) == 0x00010F1DUL)
00104 #define RMU_RSTCAUSE_PORST_XMASK         (0x00000000) 
00105 #define RMU_RSTCAUSE_BODAVDD_XMASK       (0x00000001) 
00106 #define RMU_RSTCAUSE_BODDVDD_XMASK       (0x00000003) 
00107 #define RMU_RSTCAUSE_BODREGRST_XMASK     (0x0000000F) 
00108 #define RMU_RSTCAUSE_EXTRST_XMASK        (0x0000000F) 
00109 #define RMU_RSTCAUSE_LOCKUPRST_XMASK     (0x0000001F) 
00110 #define RMU_RSTCAUSE_SYSREQRST_XMASK     (0x0000001F) 
00111 #define RMU_RSTCAUSE_WDOGRST_XMASK       (0x0000001F) 
00112 #define RMU_RSTCAUSE_EM4RST_XMASK        (0x00000003) 
00113 #define NUM_RSTCAUSES                             (9)
00114 
00115 #else
00116 #warning "RMU_RSTCAUSE XMASKs are not defined for this family."
00117 #endif
00118

00120  *******************************   STRUCTS   ***********************************
00121  ******************************************************************************/

00124 typedef struct
00125 {
00126   uint32_t resetCauseMask;
00127   uint32_t dontCareMask;
00128 } RMU_ResetCauseMasks_Typedef;
00129 
00130 
00131 /*******************************************************************************
00132  *******************************   TYPEDEFS   **********************************
00133  ******************************************************************************/

00136 static const RMU_ResetCauseMasks_Typedef  resetCauseMasks[NUM_RSTCAUSES] =
00137   {
00138     { RMU_RSTCAUSE_PORST,        RMU_RSTCAUSE_PORST_XMASK },
00139 #if defined(RMU_RSTCAUSE_BODUNREGRST)
00140     { RMU_RSTCAUSE_BODUNREGRST,  RMU_RSTCAUSE_BODUNREGRST_XMASK },
00141 #endif
00142 #if defined(RMU_RSTCAUSE_BODREGRST)
00143     { RMU_RSTCAUSE_BODREGRST,    RMU_RSTCAUSE_BODREGRST_XMASK },
00144 #endif
00145 #if defined(RMU_RSTCAUSE_AVDDBOD)
00146     { RMU_RSTCAUSE_AVDDBOD,      RMU_RSTCAUSE_BODAVDD_XMASK },
00147 #endif
00148 #if defined(RMU_RSTCAUSE_DVDDBOD)
00149     { RMU_RSTCAUSE_DVDDBOD,      RMU_RSTCAUSE_BODDVDD_XMASK },
00150 #endif
00151 #if defined(RMU_RSTCAUSE_DECBOD)
00152     { RMU_RSTCAUSE_DECBOD,       RMU_RSTCAUSE_BODREGRST_XMASK },
00153 #endif
00154     { RMU_RSTCAUSE_EXTRST,       RMU_RSTCAUSE_EXTRST_XMASK },
00155     { RMU_RSTCAUSE_WDOGRST,      RMU_RSTCAUSE_WDOGRST_XMASK },
00156     { RMU_RSTCAUSE_LOCKUPRST,    RMU_RSTCAUSE_LOCKUPRST_XMASK },
00157     { RMU_RSTCAUSE_SYSREQRST,    RMU_RSTCAUSE_SYSREQRST_XMASK },
00158 #if defined(RMU_RSTCAUSE_EM4RST)
00159     { RMU_RSTCAUSE_EM4RST,       RMU_RSTCAUSE_EM4RST_XMASK },
00160 #endif
00161 #if defined(RMU_RSTCAUSE_EM4WURST)
00162     { RMU_RSTCAUSE_EM4WURST,     RMU_RSTCAUSE_EM4WURST_XMASK },
00163 #endif
00164 #if defined(RMU_RSTCAUSE_BODAVDD0)
00165     { RMU_RSTCAUSE_BODAVDD0,     RMU_RSTCAUSE_BODAVDD0_XMASK },
00166 #endif
00167 #if defined(RMU_RSTCAUSE_BODAVDD1)
00168     { RMU_RSTCAUSE_BODAVDD1,     RMU_RSTCAUSE_BODAVDD1_XMASK },
00169 #endif
00170 #if defined(BU_PRESENT)
00171     { RMU_RSTCAUSE_BUBODVDDDREG, RMU_RSTCAUSE_BUBODVDDDREG_XMASK },
00172     { RMU_RSTCAUSE_BUBODBUVIN,   RMU_RSTCAUSE_BUBODBUVIN_XMASK },
00173     { RMU_RSTCAUSE_BUBODUNREG,   RMU_RSTCAUSE_BUBODUNREG_XMASK },
00174     { RMU_RSTCAUSE_BUBODREG,     RMU_RSTCAUSE_BUBODREG_XMASK },
00175     { RMU_RSTCAUSE_BUMODERST,    RMU_RSTCAUSE_BUMODERST_XMASK },
00176 #endif
00177   };

00183 #if defined(EMLIB_REGRESSION_TEST)
00184 /* Test variable that replaces the RSTCAUSE cause register when testing
00185    the RMU_ResetCauseGet function. */
00186 extern uint32_t rstCause;

00192 /*******************************************************************************
00193  **************************   GLOBAL FUNCTIONS   *******************************
00194  ******************************************************************************/
00195 
00196 /***************************************************************************/
00206 void RMU_ResetControl(RMU_Reset_TypeDef reset, RMU_ResetMode_TypeDef mode)
00207 {
00208   /* Note that the RMU supports bit-band access, but not peripheral bit-field set/clear */
00209 #if defined(_RMU_CTRL_PINRMODE_MASK)
00210   uint32_t val;
00211 #endif
00212   uint32_t shift;
00213 
00214   shift = EFM32_CTZ((uint32_t)reset);
00215 #if defined(_RMU_CTRL_PINRMODE_MASK)
00216   val = (uint32_t)mode << shift;
00217   RMU->CTRL = (RMU->CTRL & ~reset) | val;
00218 #else
00219   BUS_RegBitWrite(&RMU->CTRL, (uint32_t)shift, mode);
00220 #endif
00221 }
00222 
00223 
00224 /***************************************************************************/
00233 void RMU_ResetCauseClear(void)
00234 {
00235   RMU->CMD = RMU_CMD_RCCLR;
00236 
00237 #if defined(EMU_AUXCTRL_HRCCLR)
00238   {
00239     uint32_t locked;
00240 
00241     /* Clear some reset causes not cleared with RMU CMD register */
00242     /* (If EMU registers locked, they must be unlocked first) */
00243     locked = EMU->LOCK & EMU_LOCK_LOCKKEY_LOCKED;
00244     if (locked)
00245     {
00246       EMU_Unlock();
00247     }
00248 
00249     BUS_RegBitWrite(&(EMU->AUXCTRL), _EMU_AUXCTRL_HRCCLR_SHIFT, 1);
00250     BUS_RegBitWrite(&(EMU->AUXCTRL), _EMU_AUXCTRL_HRCCLR_SHIFT, 0);
00251 
00252     if (locked)
00253     {
00254       EMU_Lock();
00255     }
00256   }
00257 #endif
00258 }
00259 
00260 
00261 /***************************************************************************/
00275 uint32_t RMU_ResetCauseGet(void)
00276 {
00277 #if !defined(EMLIB_REGRESSION_TEST)
00278   uint32_t rstCause = RMU->RSTCAUSE;
00279 #endif
00280   uint32_t validRstCause = 0;
00281   uint32_t i;
00282 
00283   for (i = 0; i < NUM_RSTCAUSES; i++)
00284   {
00285     /* Checks to see if rstCause matches a RSTCAUSE and is not excluded by the X-mask */
00286     if ((rstCause & resetCauseMasks[i].resetCauseMask)
00287         && !(rstCause & resetCauseMasks[i].dontCareMask))
00288     {
00289       /* Adds the reset-cause to list of real reset-causes */
00290       validRstCause |= resetCauseMasks[i].resetCauseMask;
00291     }
00292   }
00293   return validRstCause;
00294 }
